basics.name: Matthew Mastrogiovanni
basics.label:
Think outside the box?  Of course!  I was the kid who broke apart my Rubik’s cube and reassembled it, so that I could get all the colors lined up.  Had to solve it ... didn't I?  I need answers and solutions and so do you.

My job choices are positions that are about problem solving:  
* Apprentice Electrician - Why does the garage door open, when I hit the porch light?
* Inventory control - What do you mean the left handed monkey wrench isn't on the shelf?
* I.T. - What did your password used to be?

work.company: Thales Avionics, 140 Centenninal Ave. Piscataway, NJ 08854-3908
work.desc:
* Inventory Control - Create, review, and manage cycle counts and all inventory adjustments.
* Work with Finance to finalize Cycle Count discrepancies/reconciliation.
* Research/resolve inventory issues through SAP data reporting and analysis. 
* Manage returns and vendor OS&D’s. 
* Created a system for and manage requisitions of all non-stock inventory to maintain demand levels. 
* Insure proper procedures for receiving and shipping are being followed for hazmat/non-hazmat material.
* Manage customs paperwork flow and accuracy in accordance to customs compliance regulations. 
* Train new hires.

work.company: Thales Avionics, 140 Centenninal Ave. Piscataway, NJ 08854-3908
work.desc:
* Inventory Control - Maintain up to date stock accuracy/receiving/put-away. 
* Perform cycle counting.  
* Issue and receipts of part supplies and equipment to shop floor and distribution to customer. 
* Maintain shelf life items and hazmat stock in accordance to regulations/procedures. 
* Ensures that required documentation is physically/electronically filed and accessible.

Projects: Configured & wrote the training guides for the REMSTAR/Programmed departmental MACRO keyboards/Worked with Project Management team to create a new inventory control system.

work.company: SAIC (Science Application International Corporation) at Telcordia, Piscataway, NJ
work.desc:
• IMAC support (Installs/Moves/Adds/Changes) of IBM (UNIX (AIX)) machines.
• Maintained Network Backups
• Responded to telephone calls, email and personal requests for technical support.

education.studyType: Associate of Applied Science, Computer Information Systems
